header.description: With over 10 years of experience in designing and manufacturing high-quality bathroom furniture, we proudly present our bathroom collections.

about.title: â€” is a leading international manufacturer of designer bathroom furniture
about.description: Our constant aim is to fulfil the needs of our customers. We have achieved this through our values working in perfect symbiosis, respond to the market by providing a wide range of bathroom furniture that is highly competitive in terms of design,quality and price.

catalog.title: Catalogue
catalog.description1: The Iskender brand is a leading international manufacturer of designer bathroom furniture. We create furniture to offer our customers unique furniture, completely made by us in Kyrgyzstan, with passion and attention, because we want Iskender to be synonymous with quality and reliability. Our constant goal is to meet the needs of our customers.
catalog.description2: We don't just create products - we compose a symphony of harmonious living for your space.This page provides a repertoire of our product configurations, revealing the vast potential of spatial design. From carefully selected toilet bowls to strategically placed sinks, every detail is organized to resonate with the moments of your life.
catalog.description3: Water heaters from the brand 'Aqualuxe'has been developing in the market of sanitary ware for more than 10 years, constantly expanding the range.All our products are certified and meet high quality standards. Our pricing policy and flexible conditions make our customers like-minded.
